channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- DataPower Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- DataPower Gateway

item.title: CVE-2022-22326|2024-08-03T03:07:50.310Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM Datapower Gateway 10.0.2.0 through 10.0.4.0, 10.0.1.0 through 10.0.1.5, and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.18 could allow unauthorized viewing of logs and files due to insufficient authorization checks. IBM X-Force ID: 218856.
